outline:
1. to steal, steal away, carry away
    1. (Qal) to steal
    2. (Niphal) to be stolen
    3. (Piel) to steal away
    4. (Pual) to be stolen away, be brought by stealth
    5. (Hithpael) to go by stealth, steal away
kjv_def: carry away, [idiom] indeed, secretly bring, steal (away), get by stealth.
strongs_def: to thieve (literally or figuratively); by implication, to deceive
